publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7873 Roseanna Cunningham: The Water Environment (Controlled Activities) (Scotland) Regulations 2011—That the Rural Affairs and Environment Committee recommends that the Water Environment (Controlled Activities) (Scotland) Regulations 2011 be approved. Supported by: Richard Lochhead*
